meanings: [명사] defiance, disobedience, rebellion, (formal) insubordination, (formal) recalcitrance, [동사] defy, disobey, rebel, (formal) be insubordinate (to)

vlive.korean: 반항하는 거지? You're rebelling, aren't you? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#574. 오마이갓세븐 (스페셜 DJ 갓세븐 JB&영재 with 갓세븐)
[반항은커녕 석100 진영도 밟지 못하고...] 야 너무 아픈데? [Not even a protest. He couldn't even take a step into Team Seok-100's territory] It hurts so much. 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - 서바이벌 Director's cut
vlive.english: [Not even a protest. He couldn't even take a step into Team Seok-100's territory] It hurts so much.

vlive.korean: 반항해요! She's such a rebel! 듣기 View video ITZY : [ITZY? ITZY!(있지?있지!)] EP37. 믿지와 함께 있지!

[봤냐 이 시대의 최고 반항 말랑콩떡 봤냐 완전 콩고물에 데굴데굴 해야겠지 않냐] 봤냐? [You see it? Did you see the softest rebel of this century?] You saw this? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [EXO] 엑망진창에 달팽이관 후끈후끈,, 트루 따뜻 윈터 with 엑소,, (EXO unboxing their new album 'OBSESSION’)
vlive.english: [You see it? Did you see the softest rebel of this century?] You saw this?

vlive.korean: 반항한 적? Have I rebelled? 듣기 View video Stray Kids : [Two Kids Room(투키즈룸)] VOL.4 Ep.08 현진 X 아이엔

examples.korean: He has always had a rebellious streak. 발음듣기 그는 항상 반항적인 데가 있어 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He has always had a rebellious streak. 발음

examples.korean: She rebelled against the regimentation of school life. 발음듣기 그녀는 학교생활의 엄격한 규율에 반항했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She rebelled against the regimentation of school life. 발음

examples.korean: He later rebelled against his strict religious upbringing. 발음듣기 그는 나중에 엄격한 종교적 가정교육에 반항했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He later rebelled against his strict religious upbringing. 발음

examples.korean: Most teenagers find something to rebel against. 발음듣기 대부분의 십대들은 반항할 대상을 찾아낸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Most teenagers find something to rebel against. 발음

examples.korean: a band with attitude 발음듣기 반항적인 태도를 지닌 밴드 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
